statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, attendance_status FROM student_enrollment WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE grade='A+' ORDER BY student_id DESC, course_name ASC
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE attendance_status=TRUE ORDER BY course_name
SELECT course_id, course_name, grade FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id=1
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE grade IN ('A', 'A-', 'B') ORDER BY student_id
SELECT student_id, course_name, attendance_status FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id=3
SELECT * FROM course_enrollment
SELECT student_id, grade FROM course_enrollment WHERE attendance = TRUE
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT * FROM course_enrollment ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT course_id, grade FROM course_enrollment WHERE attendance = FALSE
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_enrollment WHERE grade = 'A' AND attendance = true;
SELECT student.first_name, course_enrollment.course_id, course_enrollment.grade FROM student JOIN course_enrollment ON student.student_id = course_enrollment.student_id;
SELECT MAX(grade), MIN(grade) FROM course_enrollment GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS total_courses FROM course_enrollment;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit >= 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade = 90;
SELECT student_id, course_id, date, present FROM attendance WHERE present = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE date = '2022-03-15' AND present = true;
SELECT c.course_name, a.date, a.present FROM courses c JOIN attendance a ON c.course_id = a.course_id WHERE a.present = false;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM CourseEnrollment WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, present FROM Attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-28';
SELECT * FROM CourseEnrollment ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Student, Course WHERE Student.student_id = Course.course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND present = true;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student INNER JOIN CourseEnrollment ON Student.student_id = CourseEnrollment.student_id WHERE grade >= 'B';
SELECT * FROM CourseEnrollment WHERE attendance = true ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students;
SELECT grade_id, student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades;
SELECT attendance_id, student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM attendance;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name, department FROM teachers WHERE department LIKE '%Science%';
